attributes.action: look at the sentencing of the three individuals responsible for the abuse and death of Baby P in Harringey and call for terms that fit the severity of the crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it currently stands the three individuals charged with 'causing and allowing' the death of Baby P in Harringey can only be sentenced to a maximum of 14 years. Given the appalling cruelty of this murder plus the future risk they pose to children we are calling for life sentences. We believe this sentence would fit the severity of the crime and deter the opportunity for future abuse.  For this to happen we need the Prime Minister's intervention.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
